posts.author: Canaduck
posts.content:
Hey there!

Looking to return to NWN get some advice on a balanced PVM build with a focus on Barbarian class. There is some chance of PVP, but likely not the focus of gameplay. Here is some relevant info about the game environment in regards to this character:

Leveling is uncapped but slow. Viable endgame is between level 25-30 (This alone can take several months), so play-ability throughout leveling is important
Barbarian rage does not count towards +12 attribute cap, provides flat AB and damage increase instead. It also adds physical damage immunity
Dev Crit is disabled

Magic items are capped at +3
A lot of save-free spells have been nerfed: Bigby's, IGMS, ect.. to be not as effective. (IGMS has damage lowered, bigby's is easy to resist with str)

My ideal build would be a barbarian that has strong damage and decent damage reduction as well as high saving throws. Looking to tackle game content in party play and some soloing.

No race or weapon preference.

Thanks!

posts.author: Grimnir
posts.content:
Have you tried a buildsearch?
Lots of good Barb builds. Otherwise, going full strength Barb and mixing in some Rogue and possibly a third class like fighter is always good and easy fun. Possibly going CoT for better saves at the cost of damage.
